abstract: The Houston oil company with production in Kazakhstan, agreed to be acquired and taken private by a company formed by its chief executive, Lorrie T. Olivier.
snippet: The Houston oil company with production in Kazakhstan, agreed to be acquired and taken private by a company formed by its chief executive, Lorrie T. Olivier.
lead_paragraph: Transmeridian Exploration Inc., the Houston oil company with production in Kazakhstan, agreed on Monday to be acquired and taken private by a company formed by its chief executive, Lorrie T. Olivier.
